body.p: To his Excellency, Beriah Magoffin, Governor of the State of Kentucky.

The Petition of Anton Sauer, humbly represents, that at the ^present^ July session of the City Court of Louisville, he was indicted for an assault & Battery and his fine assessed at fifty dollars He has always borne a good character for peace and quietness and the above is the only time during a long residence in the above city that he has ever been charged with any offense against any of the laws of this Commonwealth. He further represents that the payment of the above sum would cause him great distress on account of his very limited means. He has a large family to support and he prays that the Executive clemency may be extended to him
We the undersigned neighbors & petitioner respectfully Join with him, in his petition
